group_1.textLeft: You're hired!

group_1.textRight: Thank you sooo much!

group_1.narration: I started working at the maid cafe,@and after many ups and downs...

group_1.textRight: I'm leaving the rest to you, Ikumi.

group_1.textLeft: Yes! I'll do my best as the head maid.
Good luck to you, too. I'll be at your live@show for sure!

group_1.textRight: Great! I'll invite everyone once I know the@date.

group_1.textLeft: I'm looking forward to it!

group_1.textRight: Why are you crying, Ikumi?

group_1.textLeft: I'm just...so happy for you... You worked@super hard...

group_1.textRight: As you age you do tend to get more@teary-eyed.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305302:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]Hey! Don't call me old!

group_1.textRight: I didn't call you old. Also, you've been out@of character this whole time.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305302:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Oh pretty pleeease, be nice! I'm not old@at all, I'm Ikumi!
If you call me that, I'm totally gonna cry!@*Sniffle*

group_1.textRight: That's exactly what makes you appear old...

group_1.textLeft: Aww…

group_1.narration: The previous head maid was making@her debut as a professional idol,@so she recommended me as her successor.
I became the new head maid,@and was in charge of organizing@the younger maids!

group_1.textCenter: (She worked really, really hard, and it's@finally paying off for her...)
(I have to prove that I can do that, too!)
[chara:305302:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Let's show our bestest masters some extra@special love again today!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, it's Ikumin.

group_1.textRight: Looking cute, as always.

group_1.textCenter: Aww, shucks! You're making me blush!
I'll be going up on stage to perform for all@of you soon.
I hope you think it's totally adorable!

group_1.textLeft: We lucked out! Ikumin's gonna perform@today!

group_1.textRight: She's really something else. Her act is a bit@old-fashioned, though...

group_1.textLeft: But that's what makes her so great! Don't you@think so?

group_1.textRight: For sure! Everyone loves things that@capitalize on the old and retro!

group_1.textCenter: Noooooo! Don't call me old, pretty please!

group_1.narration: I worked at the cafe for nearly two years.@And people really, really liked me!@So much that I got a looot of fans.
But the other girls kept calling me "old"@because of my old-fashioned act, so@my customers started saying that too...
Even so, in this place...@I got to shine my bestest as a performer@for the first time in this maid cafe.
It's an extra-special place to me, where I@took my first steps toward becoming an idol.

group_1.textCenter: (Looks like they enjoyed my performance@a bunch today, too!)
(I'm gonna rehearse a teensy bit more at@school, then I'm off for home.)
(I don't want people saying that the cafe@is bad now that my predecessor is gone.)

group_1.textRight: Hey, Ikumi.

group_1.textLeft: Eek! [chara:305301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305301:cheek_0][chara:305301:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:305301:lipSynch_1]You totally scared me!

group_1.textRight: I'm not gonna tease you for acting way@more surprised than you are. Instead—

group_1.textLeft: Waaaaaa! Boo hooooo! You're teasing me by@saying that...

group_1.textRight: If you're free, would you mind helping me@with my rehearsing?

group_1.textLeft: Mhuh? But why me?

group_1.textRight: I'm not really good at dancing...
You might act like an old lady, but your@singing and dancing are outstanding.

group_1.textLeft: You reeeally didn't need to say the first part,@you know...
Sure! I'll help ya! I was about to go@rehearse anyway.

group_1.textRight: Thank you!

group_1.narration: That place that was sooo special to us was@suddenly about to poof into smoke...

group_1.textRight: You didn't have to come all the way here@with me...

group_1.textLeft: I'm not gonna let an adorable younger student@walk home all by their lonesome at night!
Nooow come on! Let's find what you forgot@here and go home!

group_1.textRight: Okay!

group_1.textCenter: (The cafe is kind of creepy after hours...@It's so quiet...and empty...)
(You could almost forget that the stage was@so bright and sparkly not long ago...)

group_1.textRight: Ikumi…

group_1.textLeft: Mhuh? That was super-duper quick.

group_1.textRight: Um... I just overheard that the cafe is@closing down...

group_1.textLeft: What?
